H0.text: The word apostle is derived from Greek 'apostolos' meaning. Ambassador

H1.text: The word apostle is derived from Greek 'apostolos' meaning. Envoy

H2.text: The word apostle is derived from Greek 'apostolos' meaning. Delegate

H3.text: The word apostle is derived from Greek 'apostolos' meaning. Messenger

A4.text: The word apostle is translated as 'messenger' in English.

A5.text: The word apostle is translated as 'ambassador' in English.
